"@CogWeaver":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5390cc88636872246a0d0500#post_5390cc88636872246a0d0500

There's only 3 outcomes for it

Fixed Timeline (Think Harry Potter 3 or 12 monkeys)
Dynamic Timeline (Back tot he future)
Multiverse (The new Star Trek movie)
